plot outline: The drama is sketched around the life of a girl, who wants to join the Indian Navy. Despite being the daughter and sister of an army personnel, she faces tough opposition within the family. Passionate Nikita Sachdev fights to achieve her goal. The story is about her tough military training, passion, sacrifice and love. The drama carries a message of Fair Sex equality.
title: Aarohan
plot: The story of the trials and tribulations endured by female cadets in their personal as well as professional lives as they undergo training at the Naval Academy.

The drama is sketched around the life of a girl, who wants to join the Indian Navy. Despite being the daughter and sister of an army personnel, she faces tough opposition within the family. Passionate Nikita Sachdev fights to achieve her goal. The story is about her tough military training, passion, sacrifice and love. The drama carries a message of Fair Sex equality.
